text: Claudio Lafarga (born July 25, 1979, in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico), is a Mexican actor. He is known for his work on XY. La revista (2009), 2033 (2009) and Alicia en el país de María (2014). == Filmography == === Film roles === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Roles !!
